answers.answer: The Dopomoha platform provides assistance by offering information on entry requirements at the border, procedures for seeking asylum in Romania, rights and obligations of asylum seekers, and useful resources for their stay in Romania. It is available in four languages - Romanian, Ukrainian, English, and Russian - and accessible via a browser from any device.
answers.bResponse: The Dopomoha platform provides assistance by offering information on entry requirements at the border, procedures for seeking asylum in Romania, rights and obligations of asylum seekers, and useful resources for their stay in Romania. It is available in four languages - Romanian, Ukrainian, English, and Russian - and accessible via a browser from any device. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/about

answers.answer: The Dopomoha platform was created by Code for Romania in partnership with the Department for Emergency Situations (DSU), The UN Refugee Agency, International Organization for Migration (IOM), and the National Romanian Council for Refugees (CRNR). ING Bank supports the Code for Romania War Task Force.
answers.bResponse: The Dopomoha platform was created by Code for Romania in partnership with the Department for Emergency Situations (DSU), The UN Refugee Agency, International Organization for Migration (IOM), and the National Romanian Council for Refugees (CRNR). ING Bank supports the Code for Romania War Task Force. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/about

answers.answer: The Dopomoha platform can be accessed through a browser from any device.

answers.answer: "Connect with local residents, learn about sustainable agriculture practices, grow your own produce, contribute to the local food system, create a sense of community, reduce carbon footprint through reduced transportation of food, promote biodiversity by supporting pollinators and other wildlife."
